Greetings Modeling to Learn Workshop Participants,    

We look forward to seeing you at the Modeling to Learn (MTL) Facilitation Workshop in September. As a reminder, workshop details are provided below:    

**Dates:**  
September 4-7, 2018    

**Location:**  
Prosthetic & Logistics Office, Suite 4514, VHA Admin and Data Management Office,  
2245 Enterprise Drive, Westchester, IL 60154    

**Purpose:**  
To train and empower facilitators to deliver the MTL-Live course to VA health care teams.    

Each week in August, we will be sending an email containing some “pre-work” that will help you prepare for the September workshop.
